name: Charlotte Smoothie
text: On K.O. Opponent's Turn DON!!:1: Play up to 1 (Big Mom Pirates) type Character card from your hand other than [Charlotte Smoothie] with a cost less than or equal to your opponent's DON!! cards on their field.

effect.text: Play up to 1 (Big Mom Pirates) type Character card from your hand other than [Charlotte Smoothie] with a cost less than or equal to your opponent's DON!! cards on their field.
